text: Humne Moosa ko kitab di, iske baad pai dar pai Rasool bheje, aakhir e kaar Isa Ibn Maryam ko roshan nishaniyan dekar bheja aur rooh e paak se uski madad ki, phir yeh tumhara kya dhang hai ke jab bhi koi Rasool tumhari khwahishaat e nafs ke khilaf koi cheez lekar tumhare paas aaya, to tumne uske muqable mein sarkashi hi ki, kisi ko jhutlaya aur kisi ko qatal kar daala
